Use Git Bash

navigate to cd /c/Users/User/Documents/GitHub/Test-website

type: bundle exec jekyll serve

go to  localhost:4000

OLD CODE:

    <div class = "header">
       <div class="first-third">

       </div>
       <div class = "second-third">Picture here</div>
       <div class = "third-third">

      </div>
      </div>
    </header>





    // Adding social media icon setting
.fa {
  padding: 5px;
  font-size: 20px;
  width: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
}
.fa:hover {
  opacity: 0.7;
}
.fa-envelope-o {
background: #007bb5;
color: white;
position: absolute;
bottom: 0;
right: 150px;
}
.fa-github {
background: #007bb5;
color: white;
position: absolute;
bottom: 0;
right: 100px;
}
.fa-desktop {
background: #007bb5;
color: white;
position: absolute;
bottom: 0;
right: 50px;
}
.fa-linkedin {
background: #007bb5;
color: white;
position: absolute;
bottom: 0;
right: 0;
}
